Package uno.anahata.asi.toolkit.shell

Class Shell

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.tool.HandyToolStuff
uno.anahata.asi.tool.AnahataToolkit
uno.anahata.asi.toolkit.shell.Shell
public class Shell extends AnahataToolkit
A tool provider that allows the AI model to execute commands in the local bash shell.

This tool is powerful and should be used with caution. It captures standard output, standard error, and execution metadata.
